name: avatarsGetQR
description: Converts a given plain text to a QR code image. You can use the query parameters to change the size and style of the resulting image.

text.description: Plain text to be converted to QR code image.

size.description: QR code size. Pass an integer between 0 to 1000. Defaults to 400.

margin.description: Margin from edge. Pass an integer between 0 to 10. Defaults to 1.

download.description: Return resulting image with 'Content-Disposition: attachment ' headers for the browser to start downloading it. Pass 0 for no header, or 1 for otherwise. Default value is set to 0.
